author: sky.cactus
content: The length would be part of whatever higher level transport system you are using.

author: sky.cactus
content: For example, devp2p uses an RLP-like mechanism for its transport, which means each transaction is already length prefixed.

author: sky.cactus
content: Also, what you are proposing isn't SSZ (not sure if that was intentional or not).

author: axic3354
content: What is not SSZ in this?

author: sky.cactus
content:
```
0x01 || yParity || r || s || chainid || nonce || gasPrice || gasLimit || to || value || data
```
<@!425279588009246720> The last item here is variable length, which means it needs to have an offset, and that offset is from the beginning of the SSZ payload.
